name: Spaceguy 2
description:
Nasty aliens have taken over your spacecraft and are approaching Earth to enslave the mankind. But they don’t know yet who they’re dealing with! Hijacking your space ship was a biiiiig mistake!Game features
  • old school 90s vibes will make you feel nostalgic
  • cheerful melodies
  • sufferings on every level
  • mind-blowing hardcode moments
